revised_title: On a General Treatment of Spherical Harmonics of Unrestricted Degree, Order, and Argument
tldr: This article investigates a type of spherical harmonics with unrestricted degree, order, and argument, aiming to unify various types of harmonics, such as toroidal functions and conal harmonics, under a single general treatment. The author defines two particular functions and provides representations of these functions by series, as well as expressions for the functions in terms of integrals and powers of the variables.
